alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Clarion; Jefferson; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 4:53PM EDT until June 22 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Venango County in northwestern Pennsylvania... West central Jefferson County in west central Pennsylvania... East central Armstrong County in west central Pennsylvania... Clarion County in west central Pennsylvania... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 453 PM EDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms was centered near Knox, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Clarion, Brookville, Knox, New Bethlehem, Sligo, Strattanville, Summerville, Limestone, Hawthorn, Shippenville, Corsica, and Callensburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
